item.title: Radhika Merchant Shines in a Chic Loro Piana Co-Ord Set At Dhirubhai Ambani School Annual Day - News18
item.description:
Radhika Merchant Shines in a Chic Loro Piana Co-Ord Set At Dhirubhai Ambani School Annual Day

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: News18

Radhika Merchant made a stylish appearance at the Dhirubhai Ambani International School‚Äôs annual day celebration, showcasing a blend of luxury and casual elegance.

  • She wore a chambray blue co-ord set from Loro Piana including a button-down shirt priced at ‚Çπ1,32,556 and matching trousers priced at ‚Çπ1,22,406.
  • Accessories included an Herm√®s belt, Bolide crossbody bag, and Himalaya Niloticus Crocodile Oran sandals, completing her chic look.

This event highlights the intersection of family, style, and celebration in the Ambani household.

item.title: Ilness caused by respiratory viruses increases in USA - The Times of India
item.description:
Increased Respiratory Virus Illnesses in the USA

Publication Date: Not Available | Source: CDC Update

The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported a rise in illnesses caused by respiratory viruses, predicting further increases with the flu season approaching.

  • Healthcare visits for respiratory viruses are currently at moderate levels.
  • Hospitalizations are expected to be lower compared to last year.
  • COVID-19 and Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) are significantly affecting the population.
  • Recent data shows that influenza A constitutes nearly 97% of positive flu tests.
  • Louisiana and Oregon are reporting high flu case numbers.
  • Of 1,20,000 hospital admissions since October, 72,000 were COVID-related, with 8,200 deaths.
‚ÄúIf a new variant of COVID does not emerge, the burden in hospitals will lower especially during the holiday season.‚Äù

The rise in respiratory illnesses highlights the need for continued vigilance as the flu season intensifies and COVID-19 remains a concern.

item.title: Maharashtra portfolio allocation: CM Fadnavis keeps home ministry, Ajit Pawar gets finance, Shinde gets u - The Times of India
item.description:
Maharashtra portfolio allocation: CM Fadnavis keeps home ministry, Ajit Pawar gets finance, Shinde gets urban development

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The Maharashtra government has announced new ministerial portfolios, with Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis retaining the home ministry. Ajit Pawar has been assigned finance, while Eknath Shinde will oversee urban development.

  • Devendra Fadnavis retains control over the home ministry.
  • Ajit Pawar has been appointed as the finance minister.
  • Eknath Shinde is now responsible for urban development.
"These allocations are intended to enhance governance and address pressing issues in each department." - Government Spokesperson

This reshuffle aims to strengthen the operational efficiency of the Maharashtra government.

item.title: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday ‚Äî 23 December 2024 | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Sumeet Bagadia's Stock Recommendations for December 23, 2024

Date: December 23, 2024 | Source: Live Mint

Introduction

Amidst a downturn in the Indian stock market, Sumeet Bagadia, Executive Director at Choice Broking, recommends three stocks to buy to navigate these challenging conditions.

Key Points

  • Indian stock market suffers significant losses with the Nifty 50 index dropping from 23,768 to 23,587.
  • Sumeet Bagadia advises caution as the market may approach a critical support level at 23,250.
  • Recommended stocks for buying: Titan Company, Petronet LNG, and Dr Reddy's Laboratories.

Stock Details

  • Titan Company: Buy at ‚Çπ3356.25, target ‚Çπ3555, stop loss ‚Çπ3222.
  • Petronet LNG: Buy at ‚Çπ336.45, target ‚Çπ355, stop loss ‚Çπ323.
  • Dr Reddy's Laboratories: Buy at ‚Çπ1343.65, target ‚Çπ1425, stop loss ‚Çπ1295.

Notable Quotes

‚ÄúThe overall Indian stock market bias has weakened as the Nifty 50 index has slipped below 200-DEMA support.‚Äù

Conclusion

Investors are advised to consider Bagadia's recommendations carefully in light of current market conditions, while also remaining aware of potential risks.

item.title: GST Council Meeting Highlights: GST exemption for micro and small units renting from unregistered individuals under composition scheme - BusinessLine
item.description:
GST Council Meeting Highlights: GST exemption for micro and small units renting from unregistered individuals under composition scheme

Date: December 21, 2024 Source: The Hindu BusinessLine

The GST Council convened its 55th meeting in Jaisalmer, chaired by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, addressing significant tax updates.

  • A 5% GST will be applied to ready-to-eat popcorn with salt and spices, provided it is not pre-packaged.
  • 12% GST is set for pre-packaged popcorn and 18% for caramel popcorn.
  • 5% GST is also recommended for fortified rice kernels, regardless of end use.
  • A proposal to revise GST on insurance was deferred for further deliberation.
  • The Council recommended an increase in GST from 12% to 18% for used electric vehicles (EVs) and smaller petrol/diesel cars.
‚ÄúIf these units have rented their premises from individuals who are unregistered, GST will be exempt for them.‚Äù - FM Nirmala Sitharaman

This meeting marks a pivotal step in tax reforms aimed at providing relief to micro and small enterprises while adjusting tax policies on various consumer goods.

item.title: Scientists observe ‚Äònegative time‚Äô in quantum experiments - Macau Business
item.description:
Scientists Discover 'Negative Time' in Quantum Mechanics

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Macau Business

Researchers at the University of Toronto have observed a phenomenon they describe as 'negative time,' shedding light on complex interactions between light and matter.

  • The term ‚Äònegative time‚Äô refers to the duration of excited states in atoms being measured as less than zero.
  • Experiments took over two years to optimize and involved lasers and atoms.
  • The findings challenge conventional understanding but do not imply time travel.
  • The research has garnered both skepticism and intrigue within the scientific community.
‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt want to say anything traveled backward in time,‚Äù said Aephraim Steinberg, a lead researcher.

The discovery highlights the complexities of quantum mechanics and may pave the way for further exploration of light and time.

item.title: Multistorey building collapses in Punjab‚Äôs Mohali, several feared trapped - The Hindu
item.description:
Multistorey Building Collapse in Mohali Leaving Several Trapped

Date: December 21, 2024 | Source: PTI

Rescue operations are ongoing after a multistorey building collapsed in Sohana village, Mohali, with fears that people are trapped beneath the debris.

  • The incident occurred on December 21, 2024, according to local sources.
  • District authorities have initiated rescue operations, employing two excavators and a National Disaster Response Team (NDRF) has been dispatched to the site.
  • Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann expressed concern and confirmed that rescue efforts are ongoing, urging cooperation from the public.
  • Preliminary reports suggest the building may have collapsed after excavation work was done nearby.
  • Senior police officials are monitoring the rescue operations, emphasizing the urgency of clearing the debris.
‚ÄúIt is an unfortunate incident. Rescue operation is in full swing.‚Äù - Kulwant Singh, Mohali MLA

The situation remains critical as authorities work tirelessly to locate and rescue those potentially trapped under the rubble.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office day 17 early report: Allu Arjun-starrer just Rs 10 cr away from crossing Baahubali 2‚Äôs domestic record, inches away from Rs 1030 cr - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Day 17 Early Report: Allu Arjun-Starrer Just Rs 10 Cr Away from Crossing Baahubali 2‚Äôs Domestic Record

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2: The Rule continues to break box office records as it inches closer to overtaking Baahubali 2‚Äôs domestic gross. The film has now crossed the Rs 1000 crore mark in India.

  • Pushpa 2 has earned Rs 14.36 crore on its 17th day, with expectations to cross Rs 20 crore over the weekend.
  • The film achieved a total collection of Rs 1020 crore in India till Saturday evening.
  • Pushpa 2 made Rs 264.8 crore in its second week, a 63% drop from its first week.
  • Baahubali 2‚Äôs record stands at Rs 1030.42 crore domestically, which Pushpa 2 is projected to surpass soon.
  • The film has a strong occupancy rate of 29.97% for Telugu and 23.6% for Hindi audiences on Day 17.
  • Pushpa 2 has also crossed Rs 1500 crore worldwide within its first 16 days.
‚ÄúIt looks like Pushpa 2 will cross that record soon.‚Äù

As the film continues to perform incredibly, its box office journey will be closely monitored, especially with new releases on the horizon.

item.title: Building collapses in Punjab's Mohali, several feared trapped - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Building collapses in Punjab's Mohali, several feared trapped

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

A multi-storey building in Mohali collapsed, with several people feared trapped under the debris. Emergency services are currently engaged in rescue operations.

  • A multi-storey building collapsed in Mohali, Punjab.
  • District authorities have launched a rescue operation with two excavators and a fire brigade present.
  • A loud noise was reported at the time of the collapse.
  • Causal factors are being investigated, particularly concerning basement excavation nearby.
  • Police and NDRF teams are on-site, and efforts are underway to rescue the trapped individuals.
  • Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann is coordinating with the administration and the rescue teams.
‚ÄúWe pray that there is no loss of life, we will also take action against the culprits.‚Äù - Bhagwant Mann

The incident has raised concerns about safety protocols in construction and ongoing rescue efforts are crucial for those potentially trapped.

item.title: Watch: Australian Media Baffled Over Ravindra Jadeja's Alleged Refusal To Answer Queries In English - News18
item.description:
Watch: Australian Media Baffled Over Ravindra Jadeja's Alleged Refusal To Answer Queries In English

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: News18

A Border-Gavaskar Trophy Down Under is incomplete without controversies, and the ongoing series has been no different. Australian media reported that Ravindra Jadeja did not answer questions in English during a press conference at the Melbourne Cricket Ground, causing confusion among local journalists.

  • Jadeja addressed a press conference but spoke only in Hindi.
  • A video of him discussing a previous match in Brisbane went viral.
  • The Australian media expressed bewilderment at his refusal to respond in English.
  • India's media manager had a confrontation with local reporters, stating they needed to leave.
  • This event follows another controversy involving Virat Kohli and an Australian journalist.
BREAKINGüö®The Australian media has unnecessarily targeted the Indian cricket team once again.

The controversy highlights ongoing tensions between Indian players and Australian media. Despite the confusion, the India-Australia match series remains tightly contested.

item.title: Poll Rules Tweak Makes Electronic Records Harder To Get, Sparks Row - NDTV
item.description:
Poll Rules Tweak Makes Electronic Records Harder To Get, Sparks Row

Publication Date: Recent

Source: NDTV

The government has amended election rules to limit public access to certain electronic records, which has raised concerns about transparency in the electoral process.

  • The amendment prevents public inspection of electronic records like CCTV footage and webcasting from polling stations.
  • Officials argue the change is necessary to prevent misuse and protect voter secrecy.
  • Opposition parties claim the amendment erodes the integrity of the electoral process.
  • A court case prompted the amendment, emphasizing the need for clarity regarding what documents are available for public inspection.
  • The amendment only allows access to documents explicitly mentioned in election rules.
‚ÄúIf there was ever a vindication of our assertions regarding the rapidly eroding integrity of the electoral process managed by the Election Commission of India (ECI) in recent times, this is it.‚Äù - Jairam Ramesh

This amendment has sparked considerable debate about the balance between election security and public transparency.

item.title: Josh Heuston says ‚Äòqueen‚Äô Tabu ‚Äòfed and kept him alive‚Äô on sets of Dune Prophecy. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Josh Heuston says ‚Äòqueen‚Äô Tabu ‚Äòfed and kept him alive‚Äô on sets of Dune Prophecy

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent behind-the-scenes clip, Josh Heuston praises his co-star Tabu for her kindness and support during the filming of the web series Dune: Prophecy, highlighting the bond they formed off-screen.

  • Tabu debuts as Sister Francesca in episode 5 of Dune: Prophecy.
  • Heuston plays her son, Constantine Corrino, in the series.
  • He shares how Tabu brought him authentic Indian dishes, which strengthened their rapport.
  • Fans reacted positively to Heuston's tribute to Tabu on social media.
  • Dune: Prophecy is set 10,000 years before the events of the Dune films.
‚ÄúTabu used to, like, hang out with me at the front of the trailer. And she‚Äôd bring me, like, authentic Indian dishes to set every day. So we kind of built a little bit of rapport because she kept me alive and fed me.‚Äù - Josh Heuston

This affectionate gesture from Tabu has not only endeared her to fans but also highlights the camaraderie on set, contributing to a positive atmosphere during filming.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office: Most-Watched Film Of 2024 Is Now Only 0.5 Million Tickets Away From Breaking KGF Chapter 2‚Äôs Record On BookMyShow! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office: Most-Watched Film Of 2024 Is Now Only 0.5 Million Tickets Away From Breaking KGF Chapter

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun led Pushpa 2: The Rule has surpassed massive box office records and is poised to become the highest-grossing film in India in all languages. Today, it is reported as the most-watched film of 2024 on BookMyShow.

Key Points:

  • Pushpa 2 has registered 16.5 million ticket sales, making it the highest on BookMyShow.
  • Currently only 0.5 million tickets away from KGF Chapter 2's record of 17 million.
  • It has drawn 10.8 lacs solo viewers, surpassing other films like Stree 2 and Kalki 2898 AD.
  • Box office earnings reach 1020.75 crores in India with 645 crores from Hindi.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

‚ÄúPushpa 2 is unstoppable and will soon cross that milestone as well.‚Äù

Conclusion:

Pushpa 2's remarkable performance signifies its strong audience engagement and potential to set new records in the industry.

item.title: Ghazanfar five-for leads Afghanistan to ODI series win over below-par Zimbabwe - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Afghanistan Secures ODI Series Win Over Zimbabwe with Ghazanfar's Five-Wicket Haul

Date: October 2023 | Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Afghanistan defeated Zimbabwe by eight wickets in the third ODI match, clinching the series 2-0 after the first match was washed out.

Key highlights from the match include:

  • Zimbabwe scored 127 runs in 30.1 overs, with Sean Williams top-scoring at 60 runs.
  • AM Ghazanfar took 5 wickets for 33 runs, marking his second ODI five-for.
  • Sediqullah Atal contributed significantly with the bat, scoring 52 runs off 50 balls.
  • This marks Afghanistan's sixth consecutive ODI series win against Zimbabwe.
‚ÄúAfghanistan‚Äôs bowlers proved the decision right with impressive bowling figures.‚Äù

Afghanistan's comprehensive victory underscores their dominance against Zimbabwe in ODI series history.

item.title: "After 'Pushpa 2' Stampede, Actor Said Film Will Be A Hit": Telangana MLA - NDTV
item.description:
Telangana MLA Criticizes Actor After 'Pushpa 2' Stampede Incident

Publication Date: December 8, 2023 | Source: NDTV

Telangana MLA Akbaruddin Owaisi raised concerns regarding an actor's behavior following a tragic incident at the premiere of 'Pushpa 2', where a woman died during a stampede.

  • A 35-year-old woman died during a stampede at the Sandhya Theatre on December 4.
  • The incident occurred as fans rushed to see actor Allu Arjun at the 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' premiere.
  • Owaisi claimed that the actor commented that the film will now be a hit after the incident.
  • The actor, whose name was not mentioned by Owaisi, was seen waving to fans after the stampede.
  • Police registered a case against the actor, his security team, and theatre management after the incident.
  • The Chief Minister criticized the lack of empathy shown by film personalities towards the victim's family.
‚ÄúSir, I remember once my security official's cap had fallen down while protecting me. He had to do his duty... But here you see, Sir, a woman dies, two small children were caught in the stampede...‚Äù - Akbaruddin Owaisi

The MLA's comments have sparked a debate on celebrity responsibility and crowd management during public events, especially following a tragic incident that resulted in loss of life.

item.title: Germany Christmas market attack: Minister says suspect 'an Islamophobe' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Germany Christmas Market Attack: Minister says suspect 'an Islamophobe'

Date: Dec 21, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The suspect behind the deadly Christmas market attack in Magdeburg, Germany, has been identified as 50-year-old Taleb A. He reportedly rammed his BMW into a crowded market, resulting in five fatalities and over 200 injuries.

  • The attacker, Taleb A., has lived in Germany for almost 20 years.
  • Germany's interior minister stated that the suspect is an 'Islamophobe'.
  • A Saudi source claimed the attacker had posted extremist views threatening peace and security.
  • Chancellor Olaf Scholz condemned the attack, expressing concern for the injured, with almost 40 in serious condition.
Chancellor Olaf Scholz: "What a terrible act it is to injure and kill so many people there with such brutality."

The motive remains unclear as investigations continue into Taleb A.'s past and social media activity which reveals anti-Islam sentiments.

item.title: People feared trapped after multi-storey building collapses in Punjab‚Äôs Mohali - The Indian Express
item.description:
Multi-storey building collapses in Mohali, Army fears 10-15 trapped in basement

Date: Saturday evening, Source: Indian Express

A multi-storey building collapsed in the Sohana area of Mohali, Punjab, raising concerns that several individuals may be trapped beneath the debris.

  • The building collapsed after excavation work for a nearby basement.
  • The Army has sent two engineering columns to assist in rescue efforts.
  • Estimates suggest that 10-15 people could be trapped in the basement.
  • Rescue operations are ongoing, with local police present at the scene.
  • The local former sarpanch reported that a gym was damaged at the time of the collapse.
‚ÄúAs of now, we do not know what has happened. We are looking if anyone is trapped and urge the administration to expedite the rescue work.‚Äù - Parwinder Singh Sohana, former sarpanch

The situation remains critical as the rescue team continues to search for survivors beneath the rubble.

item.title: Champions Trophy 2025: Tentative Match Schedule Released - India set to play Pakistan on February 23 - myKhel
item.description:
Champions Trophy 2025: Tentative Match Schedule Released - India set to play Pakistan on February 23

Updated: Saturday, December 21, 2024, 18:04 [IST]

The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is set to commence from February 19, 2025, promising intense cricketing action among top teams worldwide. The event, hosted in Pakistan, features eight teams divided into two groups with a notable match between India and Pakistan on February 23.

Key Points

  • The tournament begins on February 19 and concludes with the final on March 9, 2025.
  • India and Pakistan are in the same group (Group A).
  • All Indian team matches are likely to be played in Dubai as per ICC ruling.
  • The opening match will feature Pakistan vs New Zealand in Karachi.
  • The official schedule may vary, and Dubai is a tentative neutral venue.

Champions Trophy 2025 Groups

Group A: Pakistan, New Zealand, India, Bangladesh
Group B: South Africa, England, Australia, Afghanistan

‚ÄúThis highly anticipated tournament will feature gripping rivalries.‚Äù

The PCB is still renovating stadiums in Pakistan with completion expected soon.

Please note that this schedule is tentative, with possible changes ahead.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' stampede: Allu Arjun was denied police permission, says Telangana CM Revanth Reddy - The Times of India
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' Stampede Raises Concerns Over Lack of Police Permission, Says CM Revanth Reddy

Publication Date: Recent | Source: Times of India

The recent stampede during the promotional event for 'Pushpa 2' has led to significant safety concerns, with Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy stating that actor Allu Arjun was denied police permission prior to the event.

  • The Telangana CM confirmed that police clearance was not provided for the event.
  • The stampede resulted in injuries among attendees, raising alarms about crowd control at such large gatherings.
  • This incident has sparked a discussion on the safety protocols required for major film promotions.
‚ÄúSafety of the public should always be the priority, especially during large gatherings,‚Äù stated CM Revanth Reddy.

In conclusion, the incident highlights the urgent need for improved safety regulations to ensure the well-being of attendees at high-profile events.

item.title: Events tomorrow - DEC. 22: Cosmology Education and Research Training Centre (COSMOS-Mysuru) of Indian Institute of Astrophysics (IIA), Mysuru Readers and Arivu - Star of Mysore
item.description:
Events tomorrow ‚Äì DEC. 22: Cosmology Education and Research Training Centre (COSMOS-Mysuru)

Date: December 21, 2024 | Source: Star of Mysore

This event features a public talk titled ‚ÄòWhy Science Writing in Kannada?‚Äô by Kollegala Sharma, a retired Chief Scientist from CFTRI, scheduled for 4:30 PM.

  • Event hosted by the Cosmology Education and Research Training Centre (COSMOS-Mysuru).
  • Speaker: Kollegala Sharma, retd. Chief Scientist, CFTRI and Editor of Kutuhali.
  • Focus on the importance of scientific communication in regional languages.
‚ÄúScience writing in Kannada encourages wider accessibility and knowledge dissemination.‚Äù ‚Äì Kollegala Sharma

Attendees are encouraged to join for an insightful discussion on promoting science writing in local languages, enhancing knowledge sharing in the community.

item.title: PM Modi meets 101-year-old ex-IFS officer in Kuwait after granddaughter's request - Hindustan Times
item.description:
PM Modi meets 101-year-old ex-IFS officer in Kuwait after granddaughter's request

Date: Dec 21, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Prime Minister Narendra Modi met a 101-year-old former Indian Foreign Service officer in Kuwait after his granddaughter requested a meeting on social media.

  • PM Modi's visit is notable as it is the first by an Indian Prime Minister to Kuwait in 43 years.
  • The meeting was initiated by a social media request from Mangal Sain Handa‚Äôs granddaughter.
  • Mangal Sain Handa has a significant legacy as a former IFS officer.
  • Kuwait has a large Indian diaspora, constituting 21% of its total population.
‚ÄúThis is an experience of a lifetime. PM Modi said he especially came here to meet him (my father). We are grateful to Prime Minister Modi.‚Äù - Dilip Handa

PM Modi's visit emphasizes the strong ties between India and Kuwait, highlighting historical connections and mutual interests.

item.title: Samsung S95F OLED TV: what we want to see - TechRadar
item.description:
Samsung S95F OLED TV: What to Expect from the Next Generation

Publication Date: Unknown | Source: TechRadar

Samsung's S95 series OLED TVs, known for their exceptional picture quality and advanced QD-OLED technology, are set to continue evolving with the upcoming S95F model slated for release in 2025. While the current S95D has already earned accolades as one of the best TVs of 2024, the next iteration promises enhancements in AI-driven picture processing, smarter interfaces, and potentially new screen sizes.

  • The S95F will introduce advanced AI capabilities for picture and sound optimization.
  • It aims to improve peak brightness and reflection management.
  • Gamers can expect AI game optimization and higher refresh rates for a smoother experience.
  • Sustainability will be a focus, with the use of eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient design.
‚ÄúIf Samsung can combine these refinements with stunning picture quality, the S95F OLED could become a flagship TV that truly delivers on all fronts.‚Äù

The Samsung S95F OLED TV is positioned to redefine the flagship TV standard, ensuring it meets the growing demands of cinephiles and gamers alike.

item.title: Former Haryana CM Om Prakash Chautala cremated with state honours in Sirsa - The Times of India
item.description:
Former Haryana CM Om Prakash Chautala cremated with state honours in Sirsa

Date: [Publication Date] Source: [Source]

Om Prakash Chautala, a former Chief Minister of Haryana, has been cremated with full state honours in Sirsa, reflecting his significance in the region's political landscape.

  • The cremation took place amidst a large gathering of supporters and political figures.
  • Chautala served as the Chief Minister of Haryana for multiple terms and was a prominent figure in regional politics.
  • The government announced a state mourning period in his honour.
‚ÄúHis contributions to Haryana‚Äôs development will be remembered.‚Äù

This event marks a significant moment in Haryana's political history, acknowledging the life and contributions of a seasoned political leader.

item.title: Reliance Industries arm to acquire 45% stake in Health Alliance Group for $10 million | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Reliance Industries to Acquire 45% Stake in Health Alliance Group

Publication Date: December 21, 2023

Source: LiveMint

Reliance Digital Health Ltd, a subsidiary of Reliance Industries, is set to acquire a 45% equity stake in Health Alliance Group Inc. for $10 million. This investment aims to enhance healthcare access for underserved communities through a virtual diagnostic and care platform.

  • Reliance Industries announced the agreement on December 21, 2023.
  • The transaction is subject to customary closing conditions and is expected to finalize within two weeks.
  • No regulatory approvals are required for the acquisition.
  • Health Alliance Group specializes in technology-driven healthcare solutions targeting underserved populations.
‚ÄúThe investment will empower Reliance Digital to develop a virtual diagnostic and care platform.‚Äù

The acquisition reflects Reliance's commitment to improving healthcare accessibility and aligns with its digital health strategy.
